sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Loader from "../assets/Loader.svg" const Home = ({ city }) => { const [weather, setWeather] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const getData = async () => { const { data } = await axios(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=c15601da476242f8e33e17e82e4421e2`) setWeather(data) } getData() }, [city]) console.log(weather.weather) return ( weather.weather ?

{city}

{Math.round(weather?.main?.temp - 273) } °C

{ weather?.weather && weather?.weather[0].description }

{weather?.main?.humidity}%

: ) } export default Home
